mapper.insert: insert into channel (user_id, channel_title, channel_description, channel_image_name) values (#{user.id}, #{title}, #{description}, #{imageName})
mapper.select:
select c.channel_id as id, c.user_id as "user.id", c.channel_title as title, c.channel_description as description, c.channel_create_date as createDate, c.channel_update_date as updateDate, c.channel_delete_date as deleteDate, c.channel_delete_yn as deleteYn, c.channel_image_name as imageName,
from channel c where c.channel_delete_yn = 'N' order by c.channel_id asc;

select cp.user_id as "user.id", cp.channel_id as id, c.channel_title as title, c.channel_description as description, c.channel_create_date as createDate, c.channel_update_date as updateDate, c.channel_delete_date as deleteDate, c.channel_delete_yn as deleteYn, c.channel_image_name as imageName from channel_participant cp left join channel c on c.channel_id = cp.channel_id where cp.user_id = #{userId} and c.channel_delete_yn = 'N'
